Prohibition is available for private bookings, corporate events, rehearsal dinners and weddings. In addition to our main dining room which seats 70 guests, and over 120 standing, we also offer two distinctive and beautiful climate controlled outdoor patio and indoor patio areas that can seat up to 150 guests. Whether your event requires a tailor made menu or a custom crafted cocktail, our team is happy to work with you in creating your next memorable event. 547 King St, Charleston, SC 29403 843-459-7214 info@prohibitioncharleston.com BUSINESS HOURS Mon - wed 4pm - Closethurs - Sunday 11am - close‚ÄçHappy Hour Monday-Thursday 4pm-6pm (bar only) SEO by Rank The Coast

Sippin' santa takes over prohibition From November 27th through New Year‚Äôs Eve, Prohibition will be transformed into Sippin‚Äô Santa ‚Äî our annual Tiki-themed Christmas pop-up bar. During this time, the restaurant will be fully decked out in over-the-top tropical holiday d√©cor, complete with twinkling lights, themed glassware, and a lively, festive atmosphere throughout the space. We will be taking some very limited reservations. Walk-ins are encouraged. reserve a table brunch lunch dinner drinks whiskey tickets for nye available now! Ring in 2026 at Sippin' Santa for a night of festive drinks and good vibes.Come join us at for a night of festive fun and celebration as we ring in the new year in style! Conveniently located on upper King Street at Prohibition, Sippin' Santa has three bars with a large outdoor heated patio that is the perfect setting to enjoy New Years Eve with your closest friends. Our cocktails and cuisine, however, are anything but old-fashioned. Begin with an inventive cocktail crafted by Beverage Director Jim McCourt, who constantly dreams up balanced and thought-provoking libations. In the kitchen our acclaimed chef Greg Garrison puts a sophisticated and modern spin on Southern classics.
